actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize designated employees in the Office of Inspector General, Department of Agriculture, to carry firearms and to make arrests and searches in the performance of their duties, and for other purposes.
short_title: Food Stamp Law Enforcement Act of 1981

summary.text: Food Stamp Law Enforcement Act of 1981 - Authorizes designated employees of the Office of Inspector General, Department of Agriculture, who conduct criminal investigations of laws administered by the Department, including the food stamp program, to carry firearms and make arrests and searches in the performance of official duties.

titles.title: Food Stamp Law Enforcement Act of 1981

A bill to authorize designated employees in the Office of Inspector General, Department of Agriculture, to carry firearms and to make arrests and searches in the performance of their duties, and for other purposes.
